sourcesContent:
<template>
  <the-header @name="show"></the-header>
  <the-message v-if="showed === 'ak'"></the-message>
  <the-about v-if="showed === 'about'"></the-about>


</template>

<script>
import TheHeader from './components/TheHeader.vue';
import TheMessage from './components/TheMessage.vue';
import TheAbout from './components/TheAbout.vue';
import AppWorkPoint from './components/AppWorkPoint.vue';
import AppWorkProject from './components/AppWorkProject.vue';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      showed: '',
      currentPoint: 9,
      isOpen: false,
      
    }
  }, methods: {
    show(value) {
      this.showed = value;
      console.log(this.showed)
    },
    open(val) {
      if(this.currentPoint === val){
        this.isOpen = false;
        this.currentPoint = 9;
      } else {
      this.currentPoint = val,
      this.isOpen = true;
      console.log(val);
      }
    }

  },
  created() {
    
  },
 components: {
  TheHeader, TheMessage, TheAbout, AppWorkPoint, AppWorkProject
 }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
$stroke: #3c4043;
$shadow: #6B9080;
$body: #F6FFF8;
$med: #A4C3B2;
$light: #EAF4F4;
$r: 'Roboto';
$o: 'Alfa Slab One';
$c: 'Comic Neue';

.projects-list {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.container {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 0 auto;
  
    h2 {
      text-align: left;
      font-family: $o, monospace;
      font-size: 3rem;
      color: white;
      margin-left: 10vw;
      -webkit-text-fill-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.254);
      -webkit-text-stroke-width: 1px;
      -webkit-text-stroke-color: $stroke;
      text-shadow: 6px 6px $med;
    
    }
        h4 {
          font-size: 2rem;
          font-family: $r, sans-serif;
          font-weight: 400;
          color: $stroke;
          text-transform: lowercase;
        }
}

.ex-body {
  padding: 30px 0;
 
.line {
  height: 6px;
  width: 70%;
  background: $med;
  border-radius: 5px;
  margin: auto;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  position: relative;
  z-index: -1;
}
.dot {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    background: $med;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 3px solid $med;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin-top: -18px;
    margin-left: 20vw;
    z-index: 11111;
}

}


</style>
